ygData.msgSnippet: I got the DirectX 8.1 but when i go to try to play it it dowloads stuff that takes for ever anyway to speed it up? ... without it. ... i ve ... this ... what

I got the DirectX 8.1 but when i go to try to play it it dowloads
stuff that takes for ever anyway to speed it up?

> You need to download DirectX 8.1 from Windows. The game won't run
without it.
>
> Kanalyn
> Lvl 15 Druid
> Tarew Marr
